source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_00<tab>Acting Guildmaster Thubyrgeim has instructions for you from Foreseer K'lyhia.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_00<tab>巴術士ギルドマスター代理のトゥビルゲイムは、ク・リヒャからの指示を伝えようとしている。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_01<tab>Thubyrgeim explains that K'lyhia has already begun her grand strategy that will culminate in Doesmaga's downfall. Your first task in this daring scheme is to deliver a set of instructions to a fisherman known as Rhylzirn, who can be found in Costa del Sol, in eastern La Noscea.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_01<tab>ク・リヒャは、デュースマガ打倒に向け、最高の戦術を策定し、すでに作戦行動に入ったという。東ラノシア「コスタ・デル・ソル」にいる漁師「リルジルン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F501 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_02<tab>After delivering the list to Rhylzirn, you are rewarded with a fresh herring. Your next task, according to the gruff fisherman, is to take the fish you received to the cook, Opylona.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_02<tab>リルジルンに伝言を渡すと、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F601 /var>」を譲ってくれた。これを、コスタ・デル・ソルの調理師「オピロナ」へ渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_03<tab>Opylona, happy to receive the freshly caught herring, insists you take one of her homemade eel pies. The cook then relays instructions from “your arcanist colleague”: you are to deliver the pastry to Master Gegeruju, rather than succumb to the demands of your stomach.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_03<tab>オピロナに依頼の品を渡すと、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F701 /var>」を譲ってくれた。これをコスタ・デル・ソルの「ゲゲルジュ」に届けよう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_04<tab>In return for the eel pie, Master Gegeruju rewards you with a heavy purse of gil. Before you can begin counting out your new fortune, however, you receive K'lyhia's next set of instructions from P'ebaloh. It seems you must deliver the bulging sack of coins to Ealdgyth the dancer.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_04<tab>ゲゲルジュに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F701 /var>」を渡したところ、褒美として「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F801 /var>」を受け取った。これを踊り子「エルドギス」へ渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_05<tab>For what seems a somewhat exorbitant price, you give the hefty purse to Ealdgyth in exchange for her well-worn pareo and a mysterious leather satchel. As instructed, take the pareo to Drogo, the warehouse foreman.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_05<tab>エルドギスから受け取った「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87FA01 /var>」を倉庫番の「ドロゴ」へ渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_06<tab>Drogo, still questioning his good fortune at receiving Ealdgyth's pareo, gives you a bottle of vintage wine. Take the bottle, and pour a cup for the <var 1A 02 /var>Morningstar<var 1A 01 /var> crew members who are drinking at the Flying Shark.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_06<tab>ドロゴから受け取った「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87FB01 /var>」をフライングシャークにいる「モーニングスター号」の船乗りに味見させよう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_07<tab>Impressed with the vintage of the wine, Hirskskrat invites you aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Morningstar<var 1A 01 /var> to talk business with Captain Doesmaga. Speak with Hirskskrat at the jetty when you are ready to depart.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_07<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87FB01 /var>」を気に入った、船乗りヒルスクスクラトは、商談のために冒険者をデュースマガの商船「モーニングスター号」へ招いた。コスタ・デル・ソルの桟橋にいるヒルスクスクラトに声をかけよう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_08<tab>K'lyhia's clever tactics coupled with your flawless execution have led to the resounding defeat of the pirate Doesmaga. With her past firmly behind her, the foreseer is able to clearly see the reality she desired all along. Return to the Arcanists' Guild and inform Thubyrgeim of K'lyhia's decision to seek out the guildmaster.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_08<tab>ク・リヒャの戦術策定と、冒険者の活躍により、デュースマガ捕縛を成し遂げた。すべての問題を解決したク・リヒャは、本当の望みに気づき、それを実現するためにギルドマスターのもとへと旅立った。巴術士ギルドのトゥビルゲイムに報告しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_09<tab>Hand over the odd leather satchel to Thubyrgeim.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_09<tab>トゥビルゲイムに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F901 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_10<tab>After hearing of your exploits and learning of K'lyhia's decision, Thubyrgeim concludes that the pairing of the arcanima-obsessed guildmaster and foreseer will lead to great advances in the art of the arcanist. Citing your involvement as the catalyst for these developments, the acting guildmaster rewards you with a new technique and encourages you to continue improving in your chosen discipline.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_SEQ_10<tab>トゥビルゲイムによると、巴術に没頭しているク・リヒャとギルドマスターがともに行動することで、巴術のさらなる発展が期待できるという。そのきっかけを作ったのは、間違いなく冒険者である。いつの日か、ふたりに再会した時に、対等に渡り合えるよう巴術の鍛錬をたゆまず積んでいこう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the list to Rhylzirn in Costa del Sol.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_00<tab>コスタ・デル・ソルの漁師に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F501 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fresh herring to Opylona.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_01<tab>オピロナに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F601 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the homemade eel pie to Gegeruju.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_02<tab>ゲゲルジュに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F701 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the heavy purse to Ealdgyth.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_03<tab>エルドギスへ<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the well-worn pareo to Drogo.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_04<tab>ドロゴに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87FA01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the bottle of vintage wine to the sailors.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_05<tab>船乗りに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87FB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Hirskskrat.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_06<tab>ヒルスクスクラトと話す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_07<tab>Report to Thubyrgeim at the Arcanists' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_07<tab>巴術士ギルドのトゥビルゲイムに報告

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_08<tab>Hand over the leather satchel to Thubyrgeim.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TODO_08<tab>トゥビルゲイムに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87F901 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_001<tab>I've been expecting you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As ever, K'lyhia's predictions prove accurate almost down to the moment. And her mind is especially sharp with such a dangerous confrontation in the offing.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_001おかえり、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ク・リヒャの計算どおりのお出ましだね。
決戦を控え、ク・リヒャの頭は最高潮に冴えている。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_002<tab>The Yellowjackets have contacted us with word of Doesmaga: it appears his merchant vessel is presently anchored off the coast of Bloodshore.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_002イエロージャケットから、デュースマガの商船が
東ラノシアのブラッドショア沖合に
停泊中との連絡が入った。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_003<tab>Once the pirate's business there is concluded, rumor has it that he intends to embark on an extended voyage to the East. It will be some time before he returns once more to Limsa Lominsa.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_003その後、デュースマガは
東方を目指す長い航海に出帆するつもりらしい。
しばらくはリムサ・ロミンサへ戻らないだろう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_004<tab>If we pass up this opportunity, K'lyhia will lose her chance to settle the score with Doesmaga─and we risk the foreseer stumbling once more into blackest melancholy.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_004この機を逃すと、ク・リヒャがデュースマガを
打倒する機会はなくなるってわけさ。
失敗できないよ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_005<tab>Simply getting close enough to Doesmaga will prove difficult. K'lyhia has, however, already formulated a solution, and has set her grand strategy into motion.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_005デュースマガは狡猾で、近づくのも難しい。
だが、ク・リヒャは最高の戦術を策定して、
すでに現地で作戦行動に入っている。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_006<tab>Your first task in this undertaking is to travel to Costa del Sol and deliver this set of directions to a fisherman by the name of Rhylzirn. More instructions will be forthcoming.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_006まずは、急ぎ「コスタ・デル・ソル」に赴き、
この紙を漁師「リルジルン」へ渡してくれ。
その後の指示も、適宜届くはずだ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_RHYLZIRN_000_010<tab>What is it ye want, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? As ye can see, I've me 'ands full with me fishin'...
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_RHYLZIRN_000_010なにか用ですかな？
釣りに集中したいのだが……

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_RHYLZIRN_000_011<tab>Ah, thanks fer that. I been told to expect ye. 'Ere, yer to take one o' me 'errings and deliver it to the cook, Opylona.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_RHYLZIRN_000_011おお、ありがとよ。あんたが例の巴術士か。
礼がわりに、今釣った「」をやろう。
こいつを調理師「オピロナ」へ届けてみるといい。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_OPYLONA_000_020<tab>Yes, and how might I help you? Master Gegeruju is expecting his <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((supper)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((midday meal)) ((supper)) /var>)) /var> any moment now...
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_OPYLONA_000_020何か用かい？
ゲゲルジュ様のお食事の仕込みで忙しいんだが……

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_OPYLONA_000_021<tab>A fresh herring? Why, the master <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> enjoy a bite of broiled fish of <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((an evening)) ((a morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((an afternoon)) ((an evening)) /var>)) /var>. This might even earn me a few extra coins for this week's wages!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_OPYLONA_000_021これは、活きのいい魚だ。
こいつを調理すれば、ゲゲルジュ様もご機嫌さ。
あたしの、給金もまたあがるね！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_OPYLONA_000_022<tab>Well, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> have earned yourself one of my homemade eel pies! I should tell you, though, your arcanist colleague was quite insistent that you take the pie to Master Gegeruju, rather than scoff it down yourself.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_OPYLONA_000_022お礼に、あたしが作った「」をあげよう。
これを地主ゲゲルジュ様に届けるよう伝えてくれと、
ミコッテ族の巴術士に言われたよ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_GEGERUJU_000_030<tab>And what brings <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to my─and I use the term facetiously─humble abode, dear <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? Mmm, such a heavenly aroma. Are you, perchance, carrying an eel pie about your person?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_GEGERUJU_000_030なんだ、貴様は？
うーむ、貴様のニオイ……
さては貴様、「」を所持しておるな？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_GEGERUJU_000_031<tab>How commendable that you should research the delicacies that tickle my fancy before daring to intrude upon my most ponderous of ponderings. Speaking of ponderous─well, <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> was speaking of it, at least─I have a hefty purse of gil to persuade you to relinquish your claim on that pastry...
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_GEGERUJU_000_031ワシの大好物を調べてから、
挨拶に来るとは、殊勝な心がけだの。
よし、「」を取らせるから、パイを……。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_PEBALOH_000_041<tab>One moment, if you will. I have been instructed by a Mealvaan's Gate assessor to hand over this message to whoever delivers an eel pie to Master Gegeruju.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_PEBALOH_000_041お待ちを。
ゲゲルジュ様にパイを届けた冒険者に、この紙を
渡すよう、税関公社の検査官から依頼されました。

source:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TALK_SCENE00003_000_42(-Message-)Take the purse you received from Master Gegeruju, and hand it to the dancer Ealdgyth as she prepares to return home.

K'lyhia
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TALK_SCENE00003_000_42(-紙片の内容-)ゲゲルジュから受け取ったものを
仕事帰りの踊り子「エルドギス」へ渡す。
ク・リヒャ

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_050<tab>Yes? If you're looking for a dancer, then I would first see your coin. I've three children to feed, and no time to waste on idle chat.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_050なんか用？
いくらくれるかで、相手する時間は変わるわよ？
子供らが腹すかせて待ってるから、急いでるんだけど。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_051<tab>Oh my, that <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> quite a purse! My precious darlings will eat like kings this week!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_051やだ、こんなにお金くれるの！？
すごーい！　これなら、うちの子3人とも、
しっかりご飯を食べさせられるわ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_052<tab>And such a simple job, as well. I was told to expect you, you see. In return for the coin, I am to give you these.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_052おいしい仕事を引き受けたもんね……。
あっ、これはこっちの話よ。
さあ、依頼人から指示された品を受け取って。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_053<tab>The leather satchel is from your Miqo'te friend, and the pareo is from me. That last item you are to deliver to Drogo, the warehouse foreman.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_EALDGYTH_000_053ミコッテ族の依頼人から預かった袋と、私のパレオよ。
このパレオを倉庫番「ドロゴ」に
届けるように伝えろって言われてるわ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_060<tab>I ain't got time fer the likes o' you: if I don't get me work squared away soon, the master'll 'ave me 'ead on a pike. Hm? Ye got summat fer me, ye say?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_060わりい、あんたの相手してるヒマねーんだわ。
早く仕事かたづけねぇと、またボスに叱られるんだ。
ん、何かくれるのか？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_061<tab>'Ey, now, ain't this Ealdgyth's pareo!?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_061おお！！　
これは、憧れの頑張り屋さんの未亡人
エルドギスさんのパレオじゃねーかっ！！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_062<tab>That Miqo'te lass said someone'd be bringin' me a gift what I couldn't refuse, an' stick me with a pitchfork if she weren't tellin' the gods' own truth! 'Ere, yer s'posed to 'ave this bottle o' wine.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_062ってことは、あんたに例のブツを渡せばいいんだな……。
いや、俺が欲しい物を届けてきた奴に「」を
渡せって、見知らぬミコッテ族に頼まれてたんだ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_063<tab>Take it to the Flyin' Shark an' pour a cup fer the sailors what're drinkin' there. That's what she told me to tell ye, anyroad. I'd watch me back if I was you, though, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>─them sailors're the meanest bunch o' cutthroats I ever did see.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DROGO_000_063んで、この酒をフライングシャークでたむろしてる
船乗りどもに、味見させろってさ。
やつら柄悪ぃから、気をつけろよ？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_070<tab>Ye want me to taste yer wine, eh? Well, now, I ain't one to pass up free grog.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_070お、酒ついでくれるって？
なら、味見してやろうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_071<tab>Llymlaen's teats! Now that's a bloody fine drop! If we ship this stuff to the East, we'll be sellin' bottles by the crate!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_071かーっ、こいつぁ絶品だ！
この酒をひんがしの国まで運べば、
バカ売れ確実、大儲け確実だな。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_072<tab>Yer comin' with us back to the <var 1A 02 /var>Morningstar<var 1A 01 /var>. The captain'll want to 'ave a word with ye.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_072なあ、あんたうちの商船「モーニングスター号」へ来ねえか？
お頭に、この酒を紹介してえんだ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_Q1_000_001<tab>Agree to board the <var 1A 02 /var>Morningstar<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_Q1_000_001<tab>商船「モーニングスター号」へ案内される？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_A1_000_001<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_A1_000_001<tab>はい

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_A2_000_002<tab>No
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_A2_000_002<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_073<tab>Eh? Are ye tryin' to turn down me business proposition!? I reckon ye might want to think again.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_073なに！？
てめえ、俺に逆らおうってのか！？
もう一度、よく考えてみろ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_080<tab>There's a good <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. An' as fer ye, Miss Dancer, ye stick close to ol' Hirskskrat─it gets damn cold on them long sea voyages, heh heh heh.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_080よし、決まりだ。
よお、ねえちゃん、お前も一緒に来い。
お前が、今回仕入れた一番のお宝だからな。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_081<tab>(Shhh. We'll talk later.)
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_081<tab>シッ……後でね。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_090<tab>(Hush now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Make ready. And I'll need that satchel you received from Ealdgyth in a short while...)
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_090シッ……お静かに……。
エルドギスから受けとった袋……
後ほど渡してくださいね……。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_090<tab>Ye ready, then? We'll be off as soon as the boat's loaded.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_090よく来たな。
船の準備ができたら、出発だ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_101<tab>Ah, fine grog an' a fine woman. The captain'll be pleased with this haul.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_101上等な酒に、上等な女……
お頭も、ご満悦にちがいねぇ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_102<tab>Pray do not stare so. This was the most expedient method of gaining access to the ship.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_102あ、あんまり見ないでください……。
最小限の犠牲で商船に乗り込むには
この戦術が最適だったんです。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_103<tab>I will take that satchel from you now. You may have it back after I take the items I need.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_103それより、エルドギスから受けとった袋を。
要る物だけ取ったら、すぐキミに戻しますから。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_104<tab>'Ey, what mischief are you two about!?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_104おい、おめえら。
さっきから何コソコソしてやがる！？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_105<tab>I was merely borrowing some clothes. You wouldn't wish me to catch a chill from this brisk ocean air, would you?
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_105<tab>夜の海は、少々冷えるので。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_106<tab>Ye'll be dancin' yerself warm once we get ye on the ship, lass.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_106<tab>そういうことなら、しかたねぇが……。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_107<tab>Ye better slip off that ratty robe afore ye meet the captain.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_HIRSKSKRAT_000_107<tab>その貧乏臭いローブ……お頭の前では脱ぐんだぞ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_108<tab>Of course, of course!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_108<tab>はい、もちろん！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_109<tab>I'll be happy to show him the performance that awaits!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_109<tab>言われずとも、自分から脱ぎ捨てます！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_110<tab>The bitch Admiral's lapdog! Come back fer that lesson, 'ave ye?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_110アバズレ提督の飼い犬が！
調教されに来やがったか！？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_111<tab>It is I who shall be teaching this day! My lecture will focus on the manipulation of reality through applied strategy!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_111答えは否！
「戦術は、望む現実を作るためにある」
この命題を証明しに来たのです！！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_112<tab>Enough o' this damn yappin'! By the time I'm done with ye, ye'll remember who yer real master is!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_112畜生に、夢や希望など存在せぬと思い知れ！
身の程知らずな妄想ごと、クラゲの餌にしてやろうぞ！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_115<tab>Ye rabid little cur!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_115<tab>迷惑な狂犬が！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_116<tab>Our numbers matter not; it is strategy that will win this battle!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_116<tab>たったふたりでも、戦術次第で望む現実は作れます！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_117<tab>Prepare yourself, Doesmaga! With your defeat will I cast off the shackles you closed on my soul!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_117デュースマガ……覚悟してください！
これまで、お前が私にしてきたこと……
私を縛る過去の鎖を、今こそ断ち切ります！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_118<tab>Ye think so, eh? Think yer fancy magicks're a match fer my blade!? Ye've got another thing comin'!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_118迷惑な狂犬は今一度、鎖につなぎ、
完全なる調教をしてやろうぞ！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_121<tab>Doesmaga now faces defeat. He will flee to the starboard rail.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_121<tab>敗北を悟ったデュースマガ、起立し、右舷前方へ逃走。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_122<tab>Obvious. Next comes his attempt to escape into the sea.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_122<tab>海への脱出を試みる。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_123<tab>Ye think yer pullin' me strings, do ye!? Think I'll dance to yer tune?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_DOSWMAGA_000_123はんっ、わしを踊らせたつもりか！？
甘い、甘い、スキだらけよ！！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TALK_DOSWMAGA_000_124<tab>Well, I ain't fallin' fer yer bloody tricks!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_TALK_DOSWMAGA_000_124このわしが、犬畜生の術中ごときに、
はまるとでも思うたか！？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_125<tab>It is at this moment he notices the Yellowjackets I had you summon in my explicit instructions to Rhylzirn.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_125<tab>そこで、キミが手配したイエロージャケットを目視！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_RHYLZIRN_000_126<tab>You were a fool to return, Doesmaga! I hear you're fond of shackles, so we brought a set especially for you!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_RHYLZIRN_000_126この時を待ち望んだぞ、デュースマガ！！
貴様が大っ嫌いな忠犬に、お縄を頂戴する気分を
じっくり聞かせてもらうぞ、監獄でな！！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_127<tab>Thus concludes today's lecture.
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_127<tab>以上、証明終わりです。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_128<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This strategy would not have succeeded without your flawless execution.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_128ありがとうございます。
キミなくして、成功しえない戦術でした。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_129<tab>...Which suggests that my tactics yet require more work. One must allow for some small deviation in performance.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_129だから、私の戦術は、まだまだです。
……当然ですよね？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_130<tab>I believe, however, that I now understand where my calculations went awry: it is not enough to wish to shape reality; one must also have a complete understanding of the reality one wishes to obtain.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_130「戦術は、望む現実を作るためにある」
なのに私は……本当に望む現実から
目を背けていたんですから。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_131<tab>It is time I sought out our guildmaster!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_131<tab>私、ギルドマスターを探しに行きます！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_132<tab>Pray convey to Mistress Thubyrgeim my fondest wishes, and my appreciation for all that she has done for me.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_132ギルドのトゥビルゲイムに伝えてください。
今まで、お世話になりました、と！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_133<tab>The true test of my strategies now begins!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_KLYHIA_000_133<tab>私の戦術は……これからが本番です！

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_YELLOW_000_139<tab>You have our gratitude. Without your bravery and skill, the Yellowjackets would still be floundering in Doesmaga's wake. Pray also send our regards to Acting Guildmaster Thubyrgeim.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_YELLOW_000_139あなたのご助力なしでは、あの大悪党を
捕らえることはできませんでした、感謝します。
ギルドマスター代理にもよろしくお伝えください。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_140<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There is much I would ask you, but first, may I have the satchel you received during your assignment?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_140お帰り、いろいろ聞きたいことがあるんだが……
まずは、ク･リヒャが手配していた袋を
あたしに託してもらえるか？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_150<tab>May I have the leather satchel you received during your assignment?
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_150まずは、ク･リヒャが手配していた袋を
あたしに託してもらえるか？

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_151<tab>The original owner needs her costume back, you see. I'll make sure everything is returned safe and sound.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_151持ち主から問い合わせが来ていてね。
大切な商売道具らしいから、あたしから返しておくよ。
ク･リヒャの門出に、あたしも少しは貢献したいしね。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_152<tab>Now, let us speak of K'lyhia. I am glad to know that she has finally freed herself to pursue her heart's desire. And you are to thank for awakening the foreseer to her self-imposed fetters.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_152それにしても……ク・リヒャはやっと出帆したか。
本当に自分が望む場所へ……。
お前さんのおかげだ、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_153<tab>The brilliance of K'lyhia's strategies served to blind her to her own feelings, and it pained me to see her suffer so.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_153ずっと心配だったのさ。
あの娘は、巴術と戦術策定以外はニブくて
自分の気持ちに気づかず、苦しそうにしてたからね。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_154<tab>Your example may even encourage K'lyhia to improve her combat abilities, although such will surely come in time─after all, she intends to study under the guildmaster's direct instruction. Imagine those two obsessive arcanists, and the complexity of the tactics they will develop...
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_154今後、あの娘が苦手としてた戦闘だって上達するだろう。
なんせ、ギルドマスターの直接指導だからね。
ふたりして、一層巴術に没頭するだろうさ……。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_155<tab>It may very well be that your actions in bringing them together will prove the catalyst that sparks a new era of invention in the art of arcanima.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_155これはひょっとすると、お前さん、
巴術が大発展する歴史的一歩を刻んだかもしれないよ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_156<tab>You, too, should look to the improvement of your discipline if you are to keep pace with all that is certain to follow. To that end, I offer you a new technique, one I pray allows you to more readily drive back your foes on the battlefield.
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_THUBYRGEIM_000_156いつか、ふたりに再会した時、対等に渡り合えるよう、
お前さんに新しい技を授けるとしよう。
今後の戦いで活用しておくれ。

source: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Sweep aside the crew of the <var 1A 02 /var>Morningstar<var 1A 01 /var> and defeat Doesmaga!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>モーニングスター号の船員を掃討し、デュースマガを倒せ！

source:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_KLYHIA_BATTLETALK_02)) (( )) 02 /var>!
This geometry will turn the tide of the battle!
target: TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_KLYHIA_BATTLETALK_02<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、この魔法陣を利用すれば、戦況を有利に導けます！

source:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_DOSWMAGA_BATTLETALK_03Fight, ye worthless sea slugs!
I oughta keelhaul the lot o' ye!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_DOSWMAGA_BATTLETALK_03ふがいない手下どもが！
しくじれば、全員、懲罰に処す！

source:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_KLYHIA_BATTLETALK_05Your brutalized crew is not up to the task, Doesmaga!
I calculate our odds of victory at 99%!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_KLYHIA_BATTLETALK_05お前が酷使している手下じゃ、私たちを止められません！
私たちが勝利する確率は、99％です！

source:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_DOSWMAGA_BATTLETALK_06Hmph, so ye can handle a few deck scrags.
Me axe'll carve yer petty plans into bloody ruin!
target:
TEXT_CLSACN300_00461_QIB_DOSWMAGA_BATTLETALK_06ふん、所詮使い捨てのコマにすぎぬわ。
犬畜生の戦略なぞ、わが斧で粉砕してやろうぞ！！
